text: This is a list of geographical features in the Free State of Saxony, Germany. == Mountains == * Ore Mountains == Rivers == * Elbe * Mulde * Neisse * Spree * Parthe * White Elster * Black Elster == Miscellaneous == * Lusatia * Silesia == Cities == see List of cities in Germany and List of cities in Saxony by population Category:Saxony-related lists Saxony Category:Geography of Saxony
title: List of places in Saxony
